citations.narrative:
The three rabbit enclosures have shallow trays under the wire floor. The enclosures are cleaned once a week (last
cleaned six days ago). Enough excreta/fecal pellets have collected in the spots each rabbit uses as their defecation area
that the pellet stack has reached and gone higher than the rabbit enclosure's wire flooring. The rabbits' haircoat and feet
can thus become contaminated by the excreta as the rabbits move around their enclosures.
Rabbit enclosures shall be kept reasonably free of excreta. Correct by 10/14/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
The three rabbit enclosures have shallow trays under the wire floor. The enclosures are cleaned once a week (last 
cleaned six days ago). Enough excreta/fecal pellets have collected in the spots each rabbit uses as their defecation area 
that the pellet stack has reached and gone higher than the rabbit enclosure's wire flooring. The rabbits' haircoat and feet 
can thus become contaminated by the excreta as the rabbits move around their enclosures.  
Rabbit enclosures shall be kept reasonably free of excreta. Correct by 10/14/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
